weather_report:
In the early hours of this Friday, Downtown San Francisco awakens to a gentle tranquility, the early morning sky mostly clear as soft winds whisper through the city streets. With a cool low of around 58, there's a comforting embrace in the air, hinting at the warmth that the day will soon offer. As the sun makes its ascent, expect a delightful transformation, bringing forth warmth creeping toward a high of 71, then settling gently around 69 as the afternoon unfolds. Gusts of wind will dance through the streets, sometimes playful at 30 mph, creating a brisk backdrop to the day's activities.

The air remains free of fog, a rarity at this time of year, allowing for expansive views of the bay and a golden glow as the day progresses. This clarity creates an inviting canvas for both the early riser strolling along the waterfront and those seeking a rejuvenating morning coffee on an outdoor patio. A light jacket in the morning gives way to perhaps a simple blouse or t-shirt by noon, perfect for indulging in a leisurely read at a park or vibrant conversations with friends while savoring the local fare. Today, the combination of sunshine and gentle breezes beckons one outdoors, encouraging exploration of the city’s hidden gems, whether it be a quiet walk through Golden Gate Park or an unhurried visit to a favorite museum—all wrapped in the allure of a splendid San Francisco day.
